scripts.__dev: shx rm -rf ./build && shx mkdir ./build && npm run copy-libav && npm run copy-libass && concurrently "vite --port 4560" "vite build --mode development --watch"
scripts._dev: shx rm -rf ./build && shx mkdir ./build && npm run copy-libav && npm run copy-html && npm run copy-libass && concurrently "serve -s -C -p 4560 build" "vite build --mode development --watch"
scripts.build: shx rm -rf build/ && vite build && npm run copy-libav && npm run copy-libass && npm run copy-html
scripts.copy-libav: shx cp node_modules/libav-wasm/build/worker.js build/libav-worker.js && shx cp node_modules/libav-wasm/build/libav.wasm build/libav.wasm
scripts.copy-libass: shx cp node_modules/jassub/dist/jassub-worker.js build/jassub-worker.js && shx cp node_modules/jassub/dist/jassub-worker-modern.wasm build/jassub-worker-modern.wasm && shx cp node_modules/jassub/dist/default.woff2 build/default.woff2
scripts.copy-html: shx cp src/index.html build/index.html && shx cp src/app.webmanifest build/app.webmanifest && copyfiles -u 2 ./src/assets/* build/assets
scripts.copy-media-player: copyfiles -u 4 ./node_modules/@banou/media-player/build/* build/tmp && shx rm build/tmp/index.js && shx mv build/tmp/* build && shx rm -rf build/tmp
scripts.build-deps: npm run build-deps-media-player && npm run build-deps-fkn-lib
scripts.build-deps-local: npm run build-deps-media-player && npm run build-deps-fkn-lib-local
scripts.build-deps-media-player: cd node_modules/@banou/media-player && npm i && npm run build && cd ../../..
scripts.build-deps-fkn-lib: cd node_modules/@fkn/lib && npm i && npm run build && cd ../../..
scripts.build-deps-fkn-lib-local: cd node_modules/@fkn/lib && npm i && npm run build-dev && cd ../../..
